summary: Digital transformation is underway across lots of industries. Being a hybrid of IT and business, I have been playing a lead role in that, especially finding new ways of working with AI/ML.

publications.name: Upstream Information Systems developments from the perspective of integration in the last 5 years (Page 68)
Petrophysical Interpretation of Well Log Data Using VFSA-I2 Algorithm
A New Global Well-logging Inversion Method for Characterization of Hydrocarbon Formations
publications.publisher: 13th European Symposium on Improved Oil Recovery

profile_positions.description:
- Contribute and lead cross-disciplinary (virtual) teams to provide integration of end-to-end workflows, mainly in geophysics, petrophysics,  production geology, wells and reservoir management 
- Focal point (workflow mapping, user stories, prototyping) to Software development esp. for PP workhorse Techlog plug-ins agile and DevOps way.
- Deployment and roll-out of applications globally in multi-cultural environment. Product Ownership.
- Involved as business consultant using my domain knowledge in several data analytics/AI/ML initiatives as part of the digitalization journey to set up new/amended workflows augmented by ML, espesially in formation evaluation, multimineral interpretations (e.g. Quanti Elan), facies modeling from core to seismic scale (e.g. IPSOM, random forrest, CNNs), log QA/QC (depth matching, env. corrections, hydrocarbon corrections, blocking and squaring ), analogue database, synthetic logs, log conditioning, mud logging, LWD logging, real-time dataflow in drilling/logging operations and in petrophysical property/attribute modeling (3D, 4D) in geology
- Contributed in competitive scopeing to save time and cost by reducing number of logging jobs, in the same time provide the necessary information
- Mastery in Data Management (data lake, virtualization, big data).
- Focused on innovation - applying the latest technology in the workflows to gain efficiency through saving time/money.
- Strong R&D vein to invent/chase new AI/ML applications/functionalities.
profile_positions.title: Senior Subsurface Workflow Consultant and Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
- Understand Upstream value chain
- Broad knowledge on petrophysics including cased-hole, production log interpretation and evaluation. 
- Apply and lead IT and business standards/frameworks (ITIL, TOGAF). 
- Contribute and lead cross-disciplinary (virtual) team by understanding the integration of end-to-end data/workflows. 
- Contributing (workflow mapping, user stories, prep for deployment and roll-out) to Software development esp. Techlog, Recall, PetroSigns Earth on agile and DevOps way. 
- Deployment and roll-out of applications globally in multi-cultural environment (Techlog, Recall, EDM, OpenWorks). 
- Product Ownership to PP and Production/Operation Geology applications.
- Upstream Data and Workflow Management (not limited to PP)
- Strategic view on agile/devops software development. 
- Formulating and implementing application portfolio management strategy. 
- Focuded on innovation - applying the latest technology in the workflows to gain efficiency through saving time/money
- Understand data analytics/AI/ML challenges/importance as part of the digitalization journey. Prototyping in Python, deploying in .Net, Alteryx, etc.
- Contribute to digital transformation by identifying/proposing application opportunities in Upstream especially formation evaluation, petrophysical property modeling in geology
- Lead digital transformation in Petrophysics and Production Geology, exposed in EU (UK, NOR, NL, Russia), Middle East (Oman, Qatar, Iraq, UAE), AsiaPac (AUS, NZ, MY, India, Brunei, China), Americas (BRA, US, CAN, T&T)
profile_positions.title: Subsurface and Wells Workflows - Team Lead for Petrophysics and Production Geology

profile_positions.location: HUN, KAZ, Iraq, Oman, CRO, PAK, RUS (Global  role)
profile_positions.description:
We live in the digital age. One of its the most exciting flavor  is to manage tremendous data. We measure every single process, activity, even heartbeat and breath we take in order to investigate and find connections/mechanisms between them aided by smart algorithms/AI/ML. Why? Because through careful data analytics we can learn, describe, model our operations more precise. Thus we can predict the future better and optimize processes far more accurate. I believe, technology equipped by the proper IT tools is constantly ready to provide this ability to us.
I have my contribution to this challenges, been a kind of Chief Data Officer (CDO) in Upstream, covered the entire upstream value chain globally, by providing an integrated Application / IT / IM / Data management and Analytics support.
profile_positions.title: Head of Upstream Information and Data Management

profile_positions.description:
- Managed large-scale geosolution deployment/roll-out type of IT projects with immediate business impact in various assets across the globe,
- Led change management/transition w.r.t. target operating model/workflow changes,
- Implement Halliburton/Landmark’s Engineering Desktop Management tools for well design, tracking and reporting purposes (EDM, WellCat, WellPlan, StressCheck, CasingSeat, OpenWells) by a small team as a project contributor and project manager deployed in Pakistan, Iraq, Kazahstan and Hungary. Establishing and building workflows for relevant disciplines (drilling&workover management; well test team; well site geology; petrophysics)
- Introducing PetrisWINDS RECALL database and petrophysical applications (Petros3, Sigma, Image) as a project manager for Petrophysics Dept.
- Lead the deployment and roll-out Techlog in the Petrophysics community
profile_positions.title: Upstream Information Management - Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Focus was on
- Cased-hole Logging,
- Production Logging,
- Open-hole log interpretations (even carbonated and unconventional reservoirs)
- Standardized Petrophysical workflows and processes projected in geoapplication systems such as eXpress, IP, Recall, Techlog, Petrel, Geolog,
- Log witnessing, quick-look, QC on rig sites,
- Provided full-scale IT / IM/ Apps / Data management business proximity support for the team of 20, collaborating with global VP-ship.
profile_positions.title: Senior Petrophysicist (Data engineer)

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for data preparation, data loading, data archive and providing daily Borehole Data Management (ETL) and upstream IT support for my petrophysicist-mates: 
- Picked up the knowledge on upstream processes/value chain;
- Working on logging programs, cased-hole and production log interpretations, geomaps, 3D(4D) petrophysical modelling, Composite Logs (aided by WDS, eXpress, Interactive Petrophysics, Recall, OpenWorks), shaly sand reservoirs.
- Application support/platform support (ITIL)
profile_positions.title: Petrophysicist (Data engineer)
